participant_2.background:
After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

content.text: Hi! I just got back from snorkeling and saw a sea turtle!
Oh wow! That sounds amazing! I would love to go snorkeling one day!
It was really fun! I'm so glad I decided to go.
How do you like to stay active?
I make time for myself to work out and eat healthy, even if it's just a 30-minute walk every day.
That's great! I like to go for a run to clear my head after a long day of creating websites.
I can see how that would help! I do find that working out helps me to feel more focused and energized.
What do you do for work?
Oh wow! That must be a lot of work.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's a great answer! I'm sure you're a great lawyer.
Thank you! I try my best.
